text: Cool, thanks! I did discover that the graphql doesn't quite fully function (e.g. the tags returned are an array of ID's, and you can't dig down into them and get the names). I'm not familiar with building a graphql service, so if it's possible, maybe it's in the works. But I will definitely reach out to Lewis and see what's up.

If I am not mistaken, I believe <@UBY1V5ARF> is this Lewis Robinson from the above link. Thought its about 2:30 AM in Australia so I dont think they would be able to respond just yet :slightly_smiling_face:
